title: 2 Lefty and Mirrored Lefty Left Handed Wide Ruled Notebooks Plus 3 Left-handed Visio Pens, Assorted Colors
features: Notebooks open from left to right with the spiral on the right side so lefties can write without pressing their wrists into the spiral. Much more comfortable; encourages good writing habits, good posture, and more relaxed writing.
One subject notebook with 8" x 10.5",100 sheets, holes punched on left side, perforated for easy tear sheets.
Notebooks shipped may differ from color shown. Check out additional photo for color variety.

The Maped Visio pen features a triangular, soft-touch grip ergonomically designed for left-handers to use with correct posture. This design works so well for lefties that they will not need to learn the painful "hook" writing position, so their posture will be good,Â and they'll be able to write for long periods without pain.
The hooked neck and off-center tip on the Visio allows left-handers to SEE what they are writing! The fingers are farther away from the tip, so they don't hide or smudge the writing.
description: This set of two notebooks consist of wide-ruled sheets which are especially designed to help young lefties learn to form letters. This one subject, 8" x 10.5",100 sheets, opens left to right with the spiral on right side for left-handed writing convenience, holes punched on left side, perforated for easy tear sheets. Proudly announces that this notebook is the property of a lefty in regular type and also in mirrored image. Addtional photo shows the color assortment. We will pick for you one notebook from what's available in stock. Set also includes a 3 Pack of left-handed Maped Visio Pens: 1 each black, blue and red pens. Fast-drying non-smudge ink with an ultra-smooth flow. Perfect set for the lefty student.
